description:
These innovative high-performance crampons suit ice, mixed, and alpine routes. The Mono-rail design keeps them light and distributes weight evenly, and double vertical front points increase stability in steep ice. Central points underfoot improve footing on low-angle ice or while descending.

  • Made of chromoly steel
  • EVO binding is simpler and lighter than previous bindings system
  • 12-point design with 2 vertical front points that are replaceable when they wear down
  • Central points add stability while descending or on approach slabs
  • Mono-rail centre bar distributes weight over the points efficiently and ergonomically
  • Includes front and rear anti-snow plates
  • Semi-rigid design
name: Grivel G22 Plus Cramp-o-Matic EVO Crampons
